description: Video with one or more video layers, audio tracks and subtitles

locale.description: the locale for the video asset. Can be set, for example, if the video has embedded text

container.description: Container such as mpeg2-ts, mp4, HLS

asset_url.description: URL to start playback of the video asset

video_layers.description: list of video layers, may be of length 1 if the asset is not multi-bitrate

audio_tracks.description: list of audio tracks for the video

subtitles.description: list of subtitles for the asset
